name: Blizzard 1 (V)
Lore: 'General Veers'' AT-AT. Enclosed. Equipped with highly sophisticated communications gear. Employs an experimental targeting system.',
Text: 'May add 2 pilots and 8 passengers. During the power segment of a battle here, may lose X cards from hand to cause +X attrition against opponent. Immune to attrition < 4.',
